snippet.title: Tales of the Abyss - N3DS - Rise from the Abyss
snippet.description:
Tales of the Abyss was first released on PlayStation® 2 in Japan in 2005, followed by a US release in 2006. Tales of the Abyss for Nintendo 3DS is an adaptation of the PS®2 title for the 3DS handheld system and the first time the title has been available in Europe. In Tales of the Abyss, the player can move freely around enemies creating faster-paced combat. It offers a rich and complex scenario in a fantasy setting with anime-inspired characters designed by the mangaka Kosuke Fujishima.

Tales of the Abyss will gain Europe in 2011 on Nintendo 3DS only.

For more informations about this game, please visite your local Namco Bandai Games website, http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/
